alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 3:09AM PST until February 25 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow accumulations. Wind gusts up to 70 mph with dangerous wind chills. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...All mountain roadways will be impacted with dangerous winter weather conditions, including Intestate 5 through the Grapevine, Highway 14 and Highway 33.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
